summary: Action required: Fix workload deployed in a restricted project
description: Your cluster requires you to take action. The workload '${CUSTOMER_WORKLOAD}' has been deployed in the '${RESTRICTED_PROJECT}' project which is a reserved project for cluster's infrastructure components. Other components are unlikely to function properly in this reserved project and should be installed to a different one. Please refer to https://docs.openshift.com/container-platform/latest/applications/projects/working-with-projects.html to learn more about working with projects
